Row.Text: Tongan Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Langi and Vaikaukau in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route you have to a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State. [icon:UNIT_SCOUT] Scouts in any Age from an empire with a Tofi'a can enter Ocean without taking damage (but cannot disembark in Distant Lands in Antiquity).

+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route you have to a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State. [icon:UNIT_SCOUT] Scouts in any Age from an empire with a Tofi'a can enter Ocean without taking damage (but cannot disembark in Distant Lands in Antiquity)..
Tongan Unique Culture Building. +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for Resources and Wonders. Ageless.
Tongan Unique Happiness Building. +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Coast and Wonders. Ageless.
